title: Attention
disc: Personal attention to every student to help them excel in their studies.

title: Problem Solving
disc: Separate problem-solving sessions and a focus on equation-solving to strengthen fundamental concepts.

title: Exams
disc: Weekly assessments with SMS alerts for parents to track student progress.

title: Separate
disc: Separate courses for NEET, JEE, CET, and board exams based on individual goals.

title: Foundation
disc: Foundation course after 10th grade to build a strong foundation for academic success.

title: Meeting
disc: Four parent meetings per year to discuss student progress and address concerns.
